author: Joe Queenan
title: Sensitivity Training for Madison Avenue
text:
In an E*Trade ad that aired during the Super Bowl, hapless octogenarians try to put out house fires, race down the beach as lifeguards and even work as DJs in a nightclub. On the surface, the message was: If you didnâ€™t plan for your retirement, you could end up working until the day you die. You idiot.
But the maddening subtext of the commercial was: Does society really want a bunch of doddering old fools trying to douse a fire, save us from drowning or spin some platters?
...
